org.modelio.api.diagram.dg

Interface IDiagramDG

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDiagramGraphic, IDiagramNode

    public interface IDiagramDG
extends IDiagramNode
    This class represents a diagram graphic for the diagram itself.

    A IDiagramDG id a IDiagramNode, root nodes can be retrieved using IDiagramNode.getNodes().

    Since Modelio 3.1 a diagram contains layers containing either elements graphics or drawing, graphics ordered from background to foreground:

    • a IDiagramDrawingsLayer.BACKGROUND drawing layer. It can contain only drawings
    • a IDiagramElementsLayer.MAIN elements graphic layer. It can contain only model graphics.
    • a IDiagramDrawingsLayer.TOP drawing layer. It can contain only drawings
    In future versions, a diagram will be able to contain more layers.

    • Method Detail

      • getLinks

        List<IDiagramLink> getLinks()
        Return the list of children links of this diagram.
        Returns:
        A list of links in any case, possibly an empty one. Never returns null

      • getLayers

        List<IDiagramLayer> getLayers()
        Get all diagram layers.

        The returned list is ordered from the background layer to the top layer.

        Returns:
        A list of diagram layer .
        Since:
        3.1

      • getLayer

        IDiagramLayer getLayer(String layerIdentifier)
        Get the diagram layer identified by the provided string.

        Identifier constants are provided in IDiagramDrawingsLayer and IDiagramElementsLayer.

        Parameters:
        layerIdentifier - the layer identifier.
        Returns:
        the matching diagram layer or null.
        Since:
        3.1
